name: Amy M
text: The staff/service/food is pretty underwhelming in general, but I love Little Caesar's pizza and still continued to patronize this particular LC location even though I'd been left unimpressed by them for the most part. About a month ago, I …More

name: Trudy L
text:
I went in to see 4 pizzas sitting in case,
( hot and ready -not ) a very friendly manager came out. I explained to him I wanted a hot fresh pizza. He showed me pizzas I said No he made me a fresh, hot …More

name: Thomas Stark
text:
A few times I've stopped in recently for the hot and ready pizzas. They are good. They are certainly cheap. It's a fast transaction.
I opted the other day to get the real deep dish square pie and it was amazing as …More

name: Kay MB
text: Eat here a lot. Owner is nice, the staff is quiet but has improved. My pizza is always fresh and hot.

name: Josh Robinson
text:
Update: this location is closed permanently.

Old review: Good when it's fresh, but beware old food.  The staff is attentive and friendly.

name: phil martino
text:
This is best little ceasars as far as pizza goes. I'd go to this one before the others.
Cheap and good and fast. Usually [fast].

name: Cory McNutt
text: The reasonably priced pizza was surprisingly delicious. It will be our regular place from now on. Could use better help.

name: Jeffrey Stitt
text: Was not hot and ready...but the staff was really cool

name: Candice E
text: They have good bargains.  Service is very fast. Chicken wings rubbery. Pizza tastes good. Everything else tastes just ok.  You get what you payed for.

name: Ed S
text: Got a pretzel pizza yesterday and it was very good.  A little too salty but I guess pretzels are salty so that's to be expected.  What bothered me however was the man working at the counter, the way he was dressed.  He had his pants down …More

name: William MacKay
text: Ordered a extra extra bestest pizza and received a regular pizza called store no answer! Didn't go back family was hungry! Always check orders!!

name: Amanda W
text: Waited 30 minutes for a cheese a and pepperoni pizza, finally asked for money back and left. will never come back here.

name: Jo m
text: The grab and go $5.00 box is good pizza.  However, I never seem to get to grab and go! They need to have them ready for lunch.

name: Jake Russell
text: Much improved. Good place to get great pizza now.

name: Robin M.
text: Little Ceasers is one of my family's favorite pizza places. I think their pizza is pretty good and a great deal. I'd say 4.5 stars... Only because they don't have a larger menu and topping choices. For example, no diced tomatoes, which is …More

name: Richard Hromyak
text: Go there 2 times a month to get pizza good pizza at a cheap price

name: Aidyn Bourque
text:
Whats the point of advertising hot n ready when nothing is ready?

Nothing has changed. Shame on the management team that owns this store. Ordered …More

name: Tyrone J Thomas
text: Pretty fast service.  Decent prices.

name: Robert Shapiro
text: Always grab their $5 lunch combo.  Usually get lucky and get a fresh one right out of the oven.

name: JD Griffin
text: Staff was quite nice. Fresh food is available (as opposed to the hot n ready) if you just ask

name: Metoprolol Tartrate
text: There pizza taste like cardboard. But what do you  expect for $5 bucks....

name: Alexis Wilson
text: Food is very good! It is a nice cheap alternative and the food is served quick.

name: Michael Maddox
text: My Pizza was old, dry and had next to no sauce, definitely the worst pizza ive ever had by far.

name: Cj S
text: Nothing about this place is quick. I called in an order and was told it would be ready in 10 mins, over 30 mins later I finally received my pizza. While waiting, 5 other people came in behind me and were waiting from 5 to 15 mins just to order, with no employees even greeting them.

name: Katelyn Mardis
text: Hot and ready wings had to of been rotten and sitting out way to long, gave my boyfriend food poisoning and severe stomach cramps resulting in days of terrible stomach issues. Please be careful when getting hot and ready food from this location.

name: Diane Ferriero
text: Twice now seen the young man working there with his pants down below his butt cheeks.  Once I seen dough being prepared and the person was not wearing rubber gloves.  I don't think I will be going back until I hear things have changed.

name: Krysten Hohman
text: Always quick and friendly.  Can't get better food this cheap.

name: Timothy A. Sarver, EMT-B
text: I walked in as another customer walked out, the staff member behind the counter walked into the back as I walked up to the counter. I waited several minutes before someone else came in and the doorbell rang, staff was completely oblivious …More

name: Roger Moraes
text: friendly staff, always with a smile and ready to help..

name: Rick Hromyak
text: Good pizza and quick service I'm satisfied

name: Jason Johnson
text: Never answer the phone. This place is garbage!

name: N eo
text: They don’t answer their phone. Terrible and unprofessional.

name: Lisa Only
text: I like being able to walk right in a get a pizza, without having to order it and then wait for it to be made.  I go to this Little Caesars about once a week.

name: Don Burgman
text: Another good pizza shop, made fast and good...

name: Heather Miller
text: Pizzas pretty good...especially the deep dish!

name: Melanie Layne
text: Love the food and price

name: Nanci Jean
text: My husband loves this chain which is why I go but I find the quality inconsistent and the product is routinely overcooked.

name: Sean Anderson
text: Terrible! I called to pick up a pizza, got there and the kid didn't know what I was talking about. I waited in line with a few other unhappy customers. I'll spend the extra DOUGH and go to pizza hut.

name: Greg Lewandowski
text: Good deep dish pizza, fast and cheap.

name: Matt A
text: Walk in 2 hours be for closing only had cheese ready. had to wait for a pepperoni. Hope you are not paying cash only pay with 1,5 and 10. Stuff rude will not eat at this location again

name: tlb 931
text: Because it so loud when someone open the door I cringe so bad I peed myself a little bit some times theres no bath room

name: Tom Furin
text: Food was nasty

name: Dan Krohe
text: Good service it

name: Dan Boyle
text: Good pizza

name: Josh Ice
text: Cheap and quick. Okay pizza.

name: Thomas Meyers
text: Good experience

name: Anthony Cmar
text: Great service!

name: David Bair
text: Had to wait 20min to get pizza's  pizza's weren't hot and ready to go

name: Greg Pacienza
text: Get what you pay for. 5 dollar pie

name: Mark Alles
text: This little is the shizzznit

name: Josh Sloss
text: Best little caesars around

name: Ryan Little
text: Just the usual little ceasers.

name: Rox Cava
text: They never have Hot and Ready pizzas ready.  Very slow service.

name: Shelly Reynolds
text: We love the pizza & the deals at Little Caesars!

name: Keith Orr
text: Very rude workers  and there's never any hot and ready, poor management is to blame. Will not go back!
